attributes.action: allow unlimited transfer of funds from private pensions to pay off mortgages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With increasing numbers of people losing their homes through defaulting on mortgages, and the value of private pensions in decline, the government which has done much to exacerbate the situation by such measures as the removal of Miras and taxation of pension fund dividends, should allow the unlimited movement of funds from private pension funds to repay mortgages.There is no merit in people losing their homes whilst having funds tied up in personal pensions.
